News

Search and Rescue Operation in Lisićansk completed

The search and rescue operation at the scene of the attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine (FAR) on the bakery in Lisićansk has been completed. This was reported to the Russian MES, writing the TAS.

Synoptics predict the return of the Morosa to the Penza region

On the night of Monday, 5 February, the places in Penza province are expected to be broken in the south-west wind 15-18 m/s. Air temperature is 1... 6 degrees.
04.02.2024

Diesel in Rostov has updated the base record of this season.


On Sunday, 4 February, the Penzen " Diesel " Game the Rostov Club with 7:1. That's how the team updated this season's target record.
04.02.2024

Russians warned of the risk of losing their homes because of an electronic signature.


Lawyer, Professor of the University of Finance at the Government of Russia, Kiril Danilov, in interviews with Praim, warned Rossian of the risk of being deprived of housing if the electronic digital signature (EC) was placed at the disposal of third parties.
04.02.2024

In the region, two people were killed in fires a day, two were rescued.


On Sunday, February 4th, in Penze, an electrolyte was burned in the house on Kalinin Street. The emergency happened on the 4th floor of the 9th.
04.02.2024

Parents want to be asked to monitor children ' s activities on the Internet.


The Deputies of the State of the Russian Federation are considering the proposal to establish a single system of parental control.
04.02.2024

Witnesses reported fatal accidents in the Lower Volume region


On Sunday, 4 February, a serious car accident occurred on the M-5 track in the Nizhnelom region.
04.02.2024

In the Penza region, the fight against mouse fever will be intensified


In the Penza region, they want to strengthen the prevention of the spread of hemorrhagic syndrome known as mouse. The relevant document is currently undergoing anti-corruption expertise.
04.02.2024

The economist opened a liff for Rossians with credits.


If you have borrowed, they will have to be paid in any case, but it may be possible to change the length of the bond and the amount of the monthly payment, the candidate for economic sciences, the financial analyst Michael Bellaev.
04.02.2024

The Russians explained the course of action in obtaining the wrong account for the FCC.


In receipt of the housing and public services account (HC) with an incorrect accrual of the Rossians, the company manager (PC) should be consulted.
04.02.2024

In Penza, children go to the Crust Square by Road


Eugenia ' s pen had disturbed the fact that the city authorities had not thought about the safety of the children who were visiting the palace of sports in the 65th anniversary of Victory.
04.02.2024

Decided drugs become inaccessible to penzens


The range of low-cost but demanded medications of up to 100 roubles has been halved in three years. While it had 8.8 thousand names in 2020, the 2023rd list had dropped almost half.
04.02.2024

In Kuznetsk, they thanked the woman who saved the baby from the fire.


The residents of Kuznetsk thanked the firemen who threw fire at the house on Bowman Street, as well as the woman who rescued a 3-year-old boy.
04.02.2024

The Russians listed the portable appearance of the upper clothing


The stylist and the imagery of Natasha Solomannikov listed Russians with portable exterior top clothing. The relevant material is provided by the I buying portal.
04.02.2024

Russia warned against the storage of certain products in the fridge.


Some products should not be stored in the refrigeration to avoid their loss of nutritious and digestive properties, and a specialist from the State Inspection of the City of Moscow on the Quality of Agricultural Products, Commodities and Food (Moscow) of Elena Pavlov.
04.02.2024

Prisoners were advised not to believe all letters from the tax service.


Evilians are developing a new deception scheme from FNS (Federal Tax Service). The citizens were warned in the department's telegram.
04.02.2024

Drivers affected the size of the shed in the Serdoba region


The pencil shared the footage made on the forest road near the village of the Serdoba Secretar. The video has a huge herd of cosul.
04.02.2024

In the town of Chaadaevka, there are many phases of waterfalls


A resident of the town of Chaadaevka, Cityside of Helena, wrote the PenzaInform Network on PPP at House No. 37 on Central Street under the heading " People ' s Glas " .
04.02.2024

The pen gave more than 8 million roubles after two calls.


The residents of the region continue to believe the calls that, in their name, the outsiders attempt to lend and lose savings. Well, there was a 58-year-old woman from Penza on this trick.
04.02.2024

In the Penza region, a high-readiness regime was introduced


It operates from 2 February to a special order.
04.02.2024

5 February - Opening day of the first passenger airline


Steelbirds transport millions of people every day to different parts of the world, and land overflights have become commonplace for many, not like travel on a route taxi but not a space trip.
04.02.2024

Russians warned of the increase in infections in three diseases.


In mid-February, Russians expect an outbreak of RWI, influenza and Covid. Nikolai Kritchkov's immunologist warned him about this in the conversation with Lenayru.
04.02.2024

Russia rented an apartment for a million roubles and stayed on the way with the children.


The Moscow woman rented an apartment for 1.2 million roubles and ended up in an entrance with three children. Telegram-Canal Shot reports.
03.02.2024

The pencil was videotaped by another gayer.


On Saturday, 4 February, another communal accident took place in the Penzen Shuist neighbourhood. On the footage published in the Network, it can be seen that water from the drilling bulb is striving under the foundation of the house.
03.02.2024

The owners called for lemon acid refrigerator


Lemon acid is recommended to the owners in the refrigeration to remove the unpleasant smell. Experts from Belnovosti shared this board.
03.02.2024

Russia has barely lost leave in Egypt after checking passports.


A couple from Ekaterinburg barely lost their leave in Egypt after their passports checked for control at the Koltsovo airport. This is the case, which came into force in December 2023 by the law, according to which the information in the passport must coincide with the information provided in the birth certificate, which was reported by the Russians to E1.ru.
03.02.2024

In the Penzen region, wet snow and wind are expected


On Sunday, 4 February, the North-West Cyclone will come to the Pennsentiary Region, which is stockpiled above the water. The Atlantic Ocean is a lot of moisture. In this regard, intensive landings and winds are expected.
03.02.2024

4 February - Date of birth of Penzen Region


Today, 4 February, 85 years have elapsed since the inception of the Penza region. In 1939, by decree of the Bureau of the Supreme Council of the USSR, the Tambov Region was divided and formed from a part of it.
03.02.2024

Russia spent a week treating her daughter with a cold and lost her.


Wofa's resident has been treating a 10-year-old daughter for over a week without knowing that the baby has a windmill and lost her. Telegram-canal Mash reports.
03.02.2024

The fire of death in Penza was in the bedroom


Prison investigators are conducting an examination of the death of a 70-year-old Pouchanin street.
03.02.2024

In Penza, the wastewater was thrown into the Selbouhu flood.


Inequal mountains reported to the Ministry of Forestry, Hunting and Environmental Management of the Penzen Region that leakage occurs in the area of the SNT " Urban " .
03.02.2024

In the Penza region, the villagers will be able to check their health


As of 6 February, the " Dobro in the village " event will be held at the Pendsher-Akusher Centres of the Penzen District Hospital. The villagers will be able to learn from specialists about their health.
03.02.2024

The most frequent causes of sleep disorder


Insomnia may have dozens of reasons, but in 90 per cent of cases it is stressful and life-threatening. The candidate for medical sciences, Sofia Chercasova's medical doctor. The most frequent causes of sleep disorders she called in a conversation with the Lenta.ra.
03.02.2024

The guest from Chuvashii came to Penza to study, but became a messenger courier.


In Penza, a 19-year-old Chuvashia born will be tried. He is charged with 8 frauds and 1 attempted fraud committed by a group of pre-conspiratory persons, causing significant damage to the citizen, in large amounts.
03.02.2024

Where do you know your credit history?


I wanted to borrow it from the bank, but I didn't approve it. I asked the officer what it was. He said it was probably a bad credit story. Where can I see it?
